import '../../styles/ResultTable.css' const ResultTable = (props) => { const tableContent = props.sendDataToTableContent const currentSaving = props.setSaving const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 2, }); return ( {tableContent.map((yearData) => ( ))}
Year Total Savings Interest (Year) Total Interest Invested Capital
{yearData.year} {yearData.savingsEndOfYear} {yearData.yearlyInterest} {yearData.savingsEndOfYear - currentSaving - (yearData.yearlyContribution * yearData.year)} {currentSaving + (yearData.yearlyContribution * yearData.year)}
) } export default ResultTable;
